    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    REST controller for admin-related operations on workouts and exercises.
    AtlasMongoConfig
    Configuration class for connecting to MongoDB Atlas in the cloud.
    AuthController
    REST controller for authentication operations.
    AuthRequest
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for user authentication requests.
    AuthResponse
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for authentication responses.
    BadRequestException
    Exception thrown when a request is invalid or cannot be processed due to client error.
    CloudMongoConfig
    Configuration class for MongoDB connection in the cloud environment.
    CommandLineInterface
    Command line interface (CLI) component for the Fitness Tracker System.
    CustomUserDetailsService
    Service to load user-specific data for authentication.
    DevMongoConfig
    Configuration class for MongoDB connection in the development environment.
    DiagnosticsController
    REST controller providing diagnostics endpoints.
    ErrorDetails
    A class that defines the structure of error responses returned by the API.
    Exercise
    Represents an exercise entity stored in the MongoDB collection "exercises".
    ExerciseController
    REST controller for managing Exercise entities.
    ExerciseRepository
    Repository interface for managing Exercise entities in MongoDB.
    ExerciseService
    Service class for managing Exercise entities.
    FitnessApiApplication
    Main class for the Fitness Tracker API application.
    FitnessGoal
     
    FitnessGoalController
    REST controller for managing FitnessGoal entities.
    FitnessGoalRepository
    Repository interface for managing FitnessGoal entities in MongoDB.
    FitnessGoalService
    Service class for managing FitnessGoal entities.
    GlobalExceptionHandler
    Global exception handler for the application.
    JwtAuthenticationFilter
    Filter for authenticating requests using JWT (JSON Web Token).
    JwtUtil
    Utility class for handling JSON Web Token (JWT) operations such as generating tokens, extracting information, and validating tokens.
    ProdMongoConfig
    Configuration class for MongoDB client and template setup in production and cloud environments.
    ResourceNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested resource is not found.
    SecurityConfig
    Security configuration class that sets up HTTP security, CORS, session management, and JWT authentication filter.
    StartupLogger
     
    TestDbController
    Controller to test MongoDB connection and basic operations.
    User
    Represents a user of the fitness application.
    UserController
    REST Controller for managing User entities.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for managing User entities in MongoDB.
    UserService
    Service class for managing User entities.
    ValidationErrorResponse
    Represents a response body for validation errors.
    WebConfig
     
    Workout
    Represents a workout session for a user.
    WorkoutController
    REST Controller for managing Workout entities.
    WorkoutRepository
    Repository interface for managing Workout entities in MongoDB.
    WorkoutService
    Service class for managing Workout entities.
